report.title: MNHNL Bats Sites Download Report
report.description: Lists all sites. Normally invoked from Reports tab on the form.

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for:
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM websites

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for:
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: primary_loc_type_id
param.description: Term ID for the Location Type used to indicate primary locations:

param.name: primary_name
param.description: Name to use for primary locations:

param.name: secondary_loc_type_id
param.description: Term ID for the Location Type used to indicate secondary locations:

param.name: secondary_name
param.description: Name to use for secondary locations:

tabColumn.name: points
tabColumn.func: (CASE WHEN #this#.boundary_geom is null THEN (replace(#this#.centroid_sref, ',' , '')) WHEN GeometryType(#this#.boundary_geom) = 'POINT' THEN regexp_replace(ST_AsText(ST_Transform(#this#.boundary_geom,2169)),'[(){}\x22]|\.[0-9]*|POINT','','g') WHEN GeometryType(#this#.boundary_geom) = 'MULTIPOINT' THEN regexp_replace(ST_AsText(ST_Transform(#this#.boundary_geom,2169)),'[(){}\x22]|\.[0-9]*|MULTIPOINT','', 'g') WHEN GeometryType(#this#.boundary_geom) = 'GEOMETRYCOLLECTION' AND NOT ST_IsEmpty(ST_CollectionExtract(#this#.boundary_geom, 1)) THEN regexp_replace(ST_AsText(ST_Transform(ST_CollectionExtract(#this#.boundary_geom,1),2169)),'[(){}\x22]|\.[0-9]*|MULTIPOINT','', 'g') ELSE '' END)

tabColumn.name: location_type_id
tabColumn.func: (CASE WHEN #this#.location_type_id = #primary_loc_type_id# THEN '#primary_name#'::text WHEN #this#.location_type_id = #secondary_loc_type_id# THEN '#secondary_name#'::text ELSE 'Unknown'::text END)
